name: Salthe
summary:
“Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.”

At the end of a journey of blood, despair, regret, and madness— a stage perched on the razor's edge dividing life and death. With no audience to cheer, at a jester's direction, Salthe performs her past. To learn the reason for her death. To return to the world of life.

Each scene is full of scorn and mockery, she writhes and struggles, through to the end
of the tale of Salthe's life—a comedy——
